tile module¶

The tile module provides the interface for the tiles. A tile is a hexogon that can be taken or dropped and be connected to each other to buld up islands

class tile.Tile(sim, x, y, color=2, alpha=1, mm_limit=0, mm_size=0)[source]¶

Bases: object

In the classe location all the methods for the characterstic of a location is included

drop_me(coords)[source]¶

Drops the tile

Parameters:coords – the given position
Returns:None
get_tile_status()[source]¶

Get the tile status if it taken or not

Returns:Tiles status
set_tile_status(status)[source]¶

Sets the tiles status

Parameters:status – True: Has been taken; False: Is not taken
Returns:
take(coords=0)[source]¶

Takes the tile on the given coordinate if it is not taken

Parameters:coords – Coordination of tile that should be taken
Returns:True: Successful taken; False: Cannot be taken or wrong Coordinates
touch()[source]¶

Tells the visualization that something has been modified and that it shoud changed it
